climb.usageMessage: The CLIMB command lets Lara climb up/on something in the scene. You won't be always able to climb: Lara need something to climb up/on to complete this action. You can climb in the scene using the command CLIMB [UP/ON] [SOMETHING]. Note: if you type and execute CLIMB without specific element, Lara won't complete the action.

come.usageMessage: The COME command lets Lara get off gently from high places. You won't be always able to come: Lara need something to come up/down to complete this action. Use the command COME [UP/DOWN] to . Note: if you type and execute COME, you will COME STRAIGHT by default.

cross.usageMessage: The CROSS command lets Lara cross something in the scene. You can cross in the scene using the command CROSS [PREP] [SOMETHING].

examine.usageMessage: The EXAMINE action is useful to help you explore the scene or a particular item in the scene. You can examine the scene using simply EXAMINE. If you try to examine an item you don't have in your pocket, the examine action will fail and nothing happens. You can examine an item using the command EXAMINE [ITEM_NAME] with the name of an item in the scene.

get.usageMessage: The GET action is used to get an item from the scene. If there are no items in the scene, nothing will be added to your pocket. You can get an item using the command GET [ITEM_NAME] with the name of an item in the scene.

jump.usageMessage: The JUMP command lets Lara jump into the scenario. If Lara is not stucked by something in the scene, or there's any reason why she can not move, you will be always able to jump. The jump command automatically setup the number of steps needed and eventually let Lara hang on the edge. You can jump in a specific direction in the scene using the command JUMP [STRAIGHT/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT]. Note: if you type and execute JUMP, you will JUMP STRAIGHT by default.

run.usageMessage: The RUN command lets Lara moving fast in the scene. If Lara is not stucked by something in the scene, or there's any reason why she can not move, you will be always able to run. You can move in a specific direction in the scene using the command RUN [STRAIGHT/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT]. Note: if you type and execute RUN, you will RUN STRAIGHT by default.

save.usageMessage: The SAVE action is used to save the game. You can save the game only when you meet a SAVE DIAMOND in the scene, using the command SAVE.

shot.usageMessage: The SHOT action is used to use guns against something or someone. You can shot something or someone using the command USE [ITEM_NAME] with the name of an item in the scene.

use.usageMessage: The USE action is used to use an item you hold. If you can't use the item in the scene than the item will remain in your pocket. You can use an item using the command USE [ITEM_NAME] with the name of an item in the scene.

walk.usageMessage: The WALK command lets Lara moving slow into the scenario. If Lara is not stucked by something in the scene, or there's any reason why she can not move, you will be always able to walk. You can move in a specific direction in the scene using the command WALK [STRAIGHT/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT]. Note: if you type and execute WALK, you will WALK STRAIGHT by default.

cave.levelDescription: Welcome to Tomb Raider I. You will interprete the role of Lara, a British archaeologist and treasure hunter, most commonly known for her discovery of several noted artefacts, including Excalibur, the fabled sword of King Arthur. You was hired by Jacqueline Natla to travel to the Andes mountain range, in Peru, in search of an artefact known as the Scion, which rests in the Tomb of Qualopec somewhere in the mountains. Accompanied by a guide you arrived at a huge pair of stone doors, the entrance to an ancient Incan civilisation. You climbed to the top of the doors and found a hidden switch that opens the doors. A pack of ferocious wolves suddenly attacked you from inside the cave. You leaped to the ground, killing the wolves in a barrage of pistol fire. However, you are too late, and your guide is dead in the snow. Alone, you headed into the caves in search for the village Vilcabamba.

0.stepDescription: There are some footprints coming from the North

10.stepDescription: There is a sort of corridor between the walls in front of you

20.stepDescription: Some part of the walls are covered with slots

40.stepDescription: The slots are dart emitters: you can't pass without be hurted

50.stepDescription: The walls begin to blow arrows that pierce you [run and jump]!

60.stepDescription: The cave is enormous and it seems infinite

70.stepDescription: There is a path to the right

80.stepDescription: The footprints are visible again [dots] they are coming down from the left

100.stepDescription: You are into the cave ahead

110.stepDescription: In the left corner there is a sloped block

120.stepDescription: [thinking] I could jump up and grab the ledge to climb into the niche

150.stepDescription: It seems like a secret room

160.stepDescription: There is something on the floor

190.stepDescription: [thinking]Â I could leave the chamber and follow the wolf tracks

240.stepDescription: The left part of the cave is unexplored yet

250.stepDescription: In the right corner there is a snow-covered part of the wall

290.stepDescription: There is a small medipack on the floor

310.stepDescription: Run into the back of the cave

320.stepDescription: There is a path leading out and down to the left

330.stepDescription: [thinking] I could follow the path and climb down the hill

340.stepDescription: There are some stairs [run down the stairs]

350.stepDescription: A door with a lever on the right is in front of you [use the lever to open the door]

360.stepDescription: You are now in a new chamber

400.stepDescription: You are in a part of the cave with two bridges

410.stepDescription: There are two wolves running around but can't attack you

420.stepDescription: Now run along to the right

430.stepDescription: There is a bridge: you can cross it

460.stepDescription: There is another room on the left

470.stepDescription: There is a gap on the right: in the chamber underneath a bear is hiding

480.stepDescription: There is a save crystal on the opposite side

490.stepDescription: Kill the bear in the pit underneath

530.stepDescription: Enter the next room and shoot two bats

540.stepDescription: Run towards the strange looking platform on the floor

550.stepDescription: This is a trigger for the door

570.stepDescription: Then step onto the marked platform to open the door

580.stepDescription: It's a timed door so you have to be quick

600.stepDescription: You'll end up in the cave with the bridges again

610.stepDescription: Turn right and run into the open

620.stepDescription: Run towards the skeleton statue on the right

640.stepDescription: You can also pull yourself up onto the second bridge

650.stepDescription: Run over the bridge again and jump over the pit where the bear was

660.stepDescription: There is a save crystal on the opposite side

670.stepDescription: Before you run down the stairs run behind the pillars on the left and collect a small medipack

690.stepDescription: Draw weapons and shoot the two wolves coming up the stairs

700.stepDescription: Run down and collect the small medipack lying underneath the stairs

710.stepDescription: Climb onto the platform in front of the closed gate

730.stepDescription: Make a running jump towards the green platform

770.stepDescription: Climb up onto the platform with the lever

790.stepDescription: It will open the big gate on the other platform

800.stepDescription: This gate is timed, so hurry

810.stepDescription: Turn to the left and standing jump onto the block between this platform and the one with the gate

830.stepDescription: Quickly run through the open gate [if you fail, repeat this action]

870.stepDescription: Shoot the wolf in the chamber at the top, on the left

880.stepDescription: Step onto the broken platform and drop through the Collapsible Floor

890.stepDescription: Turn right and run through the doorway

900.stepDescription: At the end, turn left and make a running jump over the gap

930.stepDescription: Draw weapons and shoot the wolf

950.stepDescription: Use the lever in the chamber the wolf came out of

960.stepDescription: Return outside and go towards the first window on the right

970.stepDescription: Slide down the hill and run through the open gate
